__TOC__



Team meetings are organized for members to discuss plans, ideas, goals, projects, funding, concerns, etc. regarding the Ubuntu Gaming community. Our meetings are held on the last Thursday of every month. Meetings may also be scheduled to plan for specific <nowiki>[[GamingTeam-Events|Events]]</nowiki> as needed. You may join us at any meeting through IRC in <nowiki>[[http://java.freenode.net//index.php?channel=ubuntu-meeting|#ubuntu-meeting]]</nowiki>. Agendas and minutes will be uploaded to the <nowiki>[[Minutes|Minutes]]</nowiki> wiki page.

The Ubuntu Gaming Team maintains a public <nowiki>[[http://google.com/calendar|Google Calendar]]</nowiki> for scheduling meetings and events.
* <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/calendar/render?cid=u07tromdjq2f29j5spf60tro50%40group.calendar.google.com|Google Calendar (Subscribe)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/calendar/embed?src=u07tromdjq2f29j5spf60tro50%40group.calendar.google.com|HTML]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/calendar/feeds/u07tromdjq2f29j5spf60tro50%40group.calendar.google.com/public/basic|XML]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/calendar/ical/u07tromdjq2f29j5spf60tro50%40group.calendar.google.com/public/basic.ics|iCal]]</nowiki>
